GSB033B. Good American is made by women, for women. All bodies. All Sizes. No compromises. In 2016, entrepreneurs Emma Grede and Khloe Kardashian launched their now-iconic denim label with the intention of redefining contemporary fashion through innovative and inclusive designs. With curves as their cause, Good American offers eco-friendly quality and style in every size, empowering women to celebrate their bodies with sexy confidence.

products.name: Blazer Mid '77 Vintage Sneaker

Raw-cut padded tongue. NIKR-WZ1032. DV7006-100. Centered around humanity and athletic innovations, Nike believes that if you have a body, you are an athlete. From footwear to an incredible variety of clothing, Nike is about enhancing performance while looking and feeling your best. Many of their shoe styles have become rare collector?s items because of their limited quantity and unique, yet classic design. Their-performance focused technologies have revolutionized athletic wear, while their exclusive fabrics such as Dri-Fit, AeroReact, and Storm-Fit highlight both function and aesthetics. Beyond apparel, Nike invests in the power of people, planet, and play with practices that seek to better serve the environment and support women in the workforce.

Erba Pura is presented with a unique silk neck scarf designed by Xerjoff and produced by famous silk manufacturers in Lake Como. Includes scarf. Made in Italy. products.name: Azurina Blue St. Monica Jeans
products.brandedName: Jeanerica Azurina Blue St. Monica Jeans
products.description: Founded in 2018, Jeanerica is a European fashion house that makes contemporary premium denim that's constructed to last using sustainable fabrics. The brand's range features essential styles in perfect fits that possess simplicity, modesty, expression, and seduction to indulge your everyday denim needs. The Azurina Blue St. Monica Jeans are a nod to sailor archives of the late 1960s with their patch pockets, cropped flare, and wide hemlines. Made in sun-faded light blue denim with the brand's signature stretch composition that adds enduring flexibility, you'll be able to wear these for hours without feeling constricted. Double down on the nautical vibe with a striped sweater and gold accessories for a preppy, cool-girl look. High rise Zip fly button closure Patch pockets Clean hem Flared leg Signature stretch composition Material: 92% Organic Cotton, 6% Recycled Polyester, 2% Elastane Care: Machine wash

Inspired by the yoga communities of NYC, Sydney, and Hawaii, THE UPSIDE combines style and function for those looking to turn heads while breaking a sweat. Created on Oahu's North Shore, founder Jodhi Meares set forth to build a brand focused on an appreciation for our planet and the pursuit of healthy living. THE UPSIDE caters to the fashion-forward and eco-conscious babe, putting bold and trendy prints on high-quality, organic, recycled, and sustainable fabrics. However, the brand doesn't focus only on designing stylish and supportive athleisure; it also contributes a portion of its profits to organizations that advocate for child protection, mental health, and inclusivity. THE UPSIDE believes that how we move through the world matters, and that it's possible to be authentically yourself while shopping ethically and helping communities in need.

products.name: Fae Midi Dress
products.brandedName: Amanda Uprichard Fae Midi Dress
products.description: Fae Midi Dress Fae Midi Dress 100% polyester. Made in China. Dry clean. Fully lined. Hidden back zipper closure. Detachable waist belt with buckle closure. Crepe fabric with back vent. Neckline to hem measures approx 38 in length. AMAN-WD2059. CI-22367. The Amanda Uprichard brand begins with Amanda. Born and raised in Florida, Amanda moved to New York City with a goal of having a creative and exciting life in fashion. After attending Parsons School of Design, Amanda's vision evolved as she drew inspiration from the fast-paced Manhattan lifestyle. Her namesake brand officially launched in 2008 - a luxe clothing line for women inspired by the independent, trendy woman on-the-go. Her use of intricate details, feminine silhouettes and bold hues defines the brand for what is - a celebration of sexy, feminine, fun.
